name: Prenatal and Home-based Infant/Toddler Services
description: Kai Ming Home Visitors work with families who are expecting a baby, and families with infants and toddlers (0 to 3 years). The Home Visitors help families to foster healthy lifestyles during pregnancy, immediately after birth, and throughout the first three years of life. They provide home visits, workshops and socialization groups (play groups), and comprehensive health and wellness services that give parents and children a solid start to early learning readiness. The services are free to eligi

howToGetIt: Contact office for information or to schedule an in-person or virtual appointment: Kai Ming Main Office | 415-982-4777 | enroll@kaiming.org | 933 Howard St. | San Francisco, CA 94103 | kaiming.org
